plentry.pd: No specified reason for the local video failure.
No permission to use the local video capturing device.
The local video capturing device is in use.
The local video capture fails. Check whether the capturing device is working properly.
11: When calling the method to share the window, the shared window is in a minimized state.

pd.p: 12: The error code indicates that a window shared by the window ID has been closed, or a full-screen window shared by the window ID has exited full-screen mode. After exiting full-screen mode, remote users cannot see the shared window. To prevent remote users from seeing a black screen, Agora recommends that you immediately stop screen sharing.

Common scenarios for reporting this error code:
When the local user closes the shared window, the SDK reports this error code.
The local user shows some slides in full-screen mode first, and then shares the windows of the slides. After the user exits full-screen mode, the SDK reports this error code.
The local user watches web video or reads web document in full-screen mode first, and then shares the window of the web video or document. After the user exits full-screen mode, the SDK reports this error code.
